name: SpaceArcade
description:
* SpaceArcade is an spaceship endless arcade game.

* Survive as long as you can to fight bosses.
* Try to get the better score and be on the top of the list.
* Fight over 10 types of enemies.
* Suport for joystic.

Developers:
Alexandre Oliveira Cajazeira | Art, Gamedesign
Alexsander Reis | Art, Gamedesign
Thiago Zacarias da Silva | Programmer, Gamedesign
